us.codecraft.webmagic.selector

Class SmartContentSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.SmartContentSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selector

    public class SmartContentSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selector
    Extract the text content of html.
    Using Readability algorithm: find parents of all p tags.
    Since:
    0.1.0
